text: Welcome, and thank you for your interest in Pipedrive ("Pipedrive", "we," or "us"), our web site at https://www.pipedrive.com (the "Site"), and all related web sites, downloadable software, mobile applications (including tablet applications), and other services provided by us and on which a link to this Privacy Notice is displayed, and all other communications with individuals though from written or oral means, such as email or phone (collectively, together with the Site, our "Service").
